summary: An enum-definition creates a new enum-type in the enclosing package.
details: Regarding the enum-type T created by a definition:
T has the EnumDefinition annotation applied directly to it.
T is a subtype of class Enum.
T does not have any direct superinterfaces.
For each enum-constant X in T, there is a field F in T such that:
The name of F is the name of X.
The type of F is T.
F is an enum-constant, according to reflection.
This method creates an array of the enum-constants declared in T.
Each invocation of the method creates a new array instance.
The elements in the array are in declaration order.
This method retrieves an enum-constant based on its name.
This method throws a NullPointerException, if name is null.
This method throws a IllegalArgumentException, if the named enum-constant cannot be found.
T inherits the following special methods from its supertypes.
static-checks: Each annotation in an annotation-list must be uniquely typed.
No two types can share the same descriptor.
Enum constants cannot share their name.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A%0Aenum City ( Paris, London, Rome );%0A%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    My::print((field City::Paris));%0A%0A    My::print((field City::London));%0A%0A    My::print((field City::Rome));%0A}%0A%0A%0Adefun print (constant : Enum) : void%0A{%0A    F::println(%22Name: %22 .. constant.name());%0A    F::println(%22Ordinal: %22 .. constant.ordinal());%0A    F::println();%0A}
example-2: module Main in examples;%0A%0A%0Aenum City ( Paris, London, Rome );%0A%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    My::print(City::valueOf(%22Paris%22));%0A%0A    My::print(City::valueOf(%22London%22));%0A%0A    My::print(City::valueOf(%22Rome%22));%0A}%0A%0A%0Adefun print (constant : Enum) : void%0A{%0A    F::println(%22Name: %22 .. constant.name());%0A    F::println(%22Ordinal: %22 .. constant.ordinal());%0A    F::println();%0A}
example-3: module Main in examples;%0A%0A%0Aenum City ( Paris, London, Rome );%0A%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val array = City::values();%0A%0A    for(i = 0; i < F::len(array); i + 1)%0A    {%0A        val constant = F::get(array, i) is Enum;%0A%0A        My::print(constant);%0A    }%0A}%0A%0A%0Adefun print (constant : Enum) : void%0A{%0A    F::println(%22Name: %22 .. constant.name());%0A    F::println(%22Ordinal: %22 .. constant.ordinal());%0A    F::println();%0A}
